resources.string: Read the text below after the press on the record icon.

The train pulled away just after Todd stepped onto it. He was traveling to Chicago for a business meeting. The meeting was on Thursday and he wanted to explore the city for a few days before the meeting. \n\n He pulled out his travel map and started to make plans. "I hope I have enough time to visit all of the sites I want to see" he thought.

-The exercise contains a complete scenario.

-The scenario is divided into small sections.

-Each section contains a phrase or question that requires your response.

-To hear the text click the speaker icon.

-Click on the microphone icon to record your answer.

-To to stop the recording press the square icon.

-If you want to rerecord your answer press the microphone icon again to start a new record.

-If you finished recording all sections, click the Done icon.
